meanings.definition: A large piece of cloth worn as a head covering or veil by Muslim women.
meanings.sent1: She wore her chadors to the mosque for prayers.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, women wear chadors as a sign of modesty.
meanings.sent3: The chadors fluttered in the wind as the women walked gracefully.
meanings.sent4: Her chadors shielded her from the harsh sun like a protective cloak.
meanings.sent5: The colorful chadors added a touch of elegance to the gathering.

meanings.definition: The traditional garment worn by women in Iran.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, all the women were dressed in beautiful chadors.
meanings.sent2: In Iran, it is common to see women wearing chadors in public places.
meanings.sent3: The chadors swirled around the women as they danced joyfully.
meanings.sent4: Her chadors symbolized her connection to her cultural roots.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the chadors were a sight to behold.
